en: Throughout your journey, you'll come across various tutorials. Complete each one of them to fulfill this quest.
To play this game, you must first master the basic character controls, including movement, hiding, and attacking.
Move in all directions for a few seconds
Attack in all directions for a few seconds
Move in all directions while hiding behind the shield for a few seconds

Now, you must master fighting techniques such as blocking attacks and defeating enemies. You also need to experience taking hits and facing death. Additionally, you must collect the hearts to recover your health.
Block three enemy attacks using the shield
Take a heart to recover your health
Take a hit from the enemy
Pick up the key and unlock the closed door
Most closed doors in the game can be unlocked with a corresponding key. Once you use a key to open a door, it will disappear from your inventory. Hint: You can pick up items using your sword.
Pick up the key to unlock the closed door
Try to solve the heart puzzle
Throughout the game, you will encounter various puzzles. Be careful, as your actions could make a puzzle unsolvable.
The path to the big heart is blocked by large boulders. Luckily, they are movable. Move them using the action key.
Push the block to the left.
Push the block to the right.
Try to pick up the big heart
